name: simondean-net_share
author: Simon Dean
description: Module for configuring Windows network file shares. Uses the 'net share' command.

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.

properties.name: path
properties.doc: File system path to be shared. Will be auto-required.

properties.name: maximumusers
properties.doc: Maximum number of users that can concurrently access the share. Valid values are 'unlimited' or a number.   Valid values are `unlimited`.  Values can match `/^[1-9][0-9]*$/`.

providers.name: net_share
providers.doc:
Windows network share

Required binaries: `c:/windows/system32/net.exe`.  Default for `operatingsystem` == `windows`.
